title: VILA VITA Parc Resort & Spa participates at luxury tourism fair loop 2016
text:
VILA VITA Parc Resort & Spa participates at luxury tourism fair loop 2016 VILA VITA Parc Resort & Spa participates at luxury tourism fair loop 2016 Details Category: Hotel Created on Monday, 03 August 2015 10:30 From 10th to 13th of April 2016 Frankfurt will transform into a mecca for the international luxury tourism industry. Germany's only luxury exhibition “loop - Luxury on our Planet" will open its doors for 100 international renowned hoteliers, hotel owners and providers of tourist luxury products to meet with 100 interested buyers from the German-speaking market. 
The exhibition has established itself over the past two years as the most important B2B event in the German luxury tourism market, with the goal to increase revenues targeted to both suppliers and retailers. Registrations can be made immediately at the trade show's website. Among the first applicants is the Vila Vita Parc Resort&Spa in Portugal that is also a member of the Leading Hotels of the World. Situated high on a cliff top, with a spectacular view of the Atlantic Ocean, and amidst 22 hectares of subtropical parkland, this 5-star luxury hideaway welcomes its guests with individual service and true Portuguese hospitality. Clients have the choice between 170 rooms and suites as well as spacious villas with their own pool and Butler service. The culinary delights served in the 8 restaurants range from rustic Portuguese specialties to award-winning gourmet cuisine (incl. a 2-Michelin star restaurant). Various bars, a café, and a wine cellar offer a wide variety of taste experiences, while the wellness area is a haven of peace, relaxation and recuperation. A perfect day is guaranteed by teeing off on the greens of the surrounding golf courses in the year-round golfing paradise of the Algarve – as well as enjoying tennis, yacht trips, the beach, the in- and outdoor pools, and the ocean. Not only does VILA VITA Parc have all the ingredients for the perfect holiday, but it is also the perfect backdrop for special events, incentives, meetings and product presentations. The famous racetrack of the Algarve is only 20 minutes away, and the hotel also has its own vineyard nearby. A dream location for unforgettable experiences! Related articles
